article_title: RCMP investigating four-vehicle fire in Moncton as arson
article_description: Four vehicles were in flames at a Moncton business on Monday morning  RCMP say
article_content: Codiac RCMP were called to the scene of a four vehicle fire at a Moncton business on Monday morning Insp  Benoit Jolette said police were called to Halifax Street  where Dynamic Towing is located around 4 50 a m Firefighters fought the blaze and paramed   306 chars
